form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cruz (for himself, Mr. Kennedy, Mr. Cornyn, Mr. Barrasso, and Mr. Lee) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise taxes on taxable chemicals and taxable substances.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Chemical Tax Repeal Act.

section.header: Repeal of excise taxes on certain chemicals and substances

subsection.text: Chapter 38 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking subchapters B and C (and by striking the items relating to such subchapters in the table of subchapters for such chapter).
The amendments made by this section shall take effect on January 1, 2025.
